title: AI isn’t the threat anymore. Avoiding it is.
description: The industry is already using AI to sharpen headlines, spot SEO trends, moderate commenting, and draft news quizzes. Next year, the shift will accelerate: reporters and editors won’t just be allowed to toy with AI — they’ll be expected to rely on it to enhance reporting and editing. By 2026, AI will no longer be...
